BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing fast food employees the ability to make voluntary contributions to not-for-profit organizations of their choice through payroll deductions, and the expiration and repeal of such amendment
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing fast food employees the ability to make voluntary contributions to not-for-profit organizations of their choice through payroll deductions, and the expiration and repeal of such amendment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting on-call scheduling for retail employees and providing advance notice of work schedules to retail employees
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting on-call scheduling for retail employees and providing advance notice of work schedules to retail employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to banning consecutive work shifts in fast food restaurants involving both the closing and opening of the restaurant
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Banning consecutive work shifts in fast food restaurants involving both the closing and opening of the restaurant.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring fast food employers to offer work shifts to current employees before hiring additional employees
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring fast food employers to offer work shifts to current employees before hiring additional employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to protecting employees who seek temporary changes to work schedules for personal events and certain other schedule changes
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Protecting employees who seek temporary changes to work schedules for personal events and certain other schedule changes.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing general provisions governing fair work practices and requiring certain fast food employers to provide advance notice of work schedules to employees and to provide a schedule change premium when hours are changed after required notices
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing general provisions governing fair work practices and requiring certain fast food employers to provide advance notice of work schedules to employees and to provide a schedule change premium when hours are changed after required notices.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing fast food employees the ability to make voluntary contributions to not-for-profit organizations of their choice through payroll deductions, and the expiration and repeal of such amendment.
